com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.tuples

Class SharedTuplePlatform

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.AbstractSharedDataPlatform<ITupleSetDescriptor,ITupleSet,ITupleStorage,ITupleQuery,ITupleQueryResult,ITupleCondition,ITupleAction>
      • com.ibm.watson.dsm.platform.tuples.SharedTuplePlatform
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ISharedDataPlatform<ITupleSetDescriptor,ITupleSet,ITupleStorage,ITupleQuery,ITupleQueryResult,ITupleCondition,ITupleAction>, ISharedTuplePlatform

    public class SharedTuplePlatform
extends AbstractSharedDataPlatform<ITupleSetDescriptor,ITupleSet,ITupleStorage,ITupleQuery,ITupleQueryResult,ITupleCondition,ITupleAction>
implements ISharedTuplePlatform
    Extends the generic super class to bind tuple-based types to the generic types.
    Author:
    dawood

    • Constructor Detail

      • SharedTuplePlatform

        public SharedTuplePlatform(IApplicationDescriptor appDesc,
                   ITupleStorage dataStorage,
                   IApplicationTopology appTopo,
                   IPhysicalTopologyMonitor physTopoMonitor,
                   IMessageReceiver msgReceiver)
        Create the instance with the given implementations. Platform monitoring is enabled per SharedTuplePlatform(IApplicationDescriptor, ITupleStorage, IApplicationTopology, IPhysicalTopologyMonitor, IMessageReceiver).
        Parameters:
        appDesc - namespace and instance for this instance
        dataStorage - tuple storage. May be null in which case a JDBCTupleStorage is created with properties from the dsm.properties file.
        appTopo - may be null, in which case superclass-defined default is used.
        physTopoMonitor - may be null, in which case superclass-defined default is used.
        msgReceiver - may be null, in which case superclass-defined default is used.

        Default values for input defined in SharedTuplePlatform(IApplicationDescriptor, ITupleStorage, IApplicationTopology, IPhysicalTopologyMonitor, IMessageReceiver).

      • SharedTuplePlatform

        public SharedTuplePlatform(IApplicationDescriptor appDesc,
                   IApplicationTopology appTopo,
                   ITupleStorage dataStorage)
        Convenience constructor. Create the instance with given data, and use defaults for IPhysicalToplogyMonitor and IMessageReceiver.
        Parameters:
        appDesc - name space and instance id for this instance.
        appTopo - may be null, in which case the default is used.
        dataStorage - may be null, in which case the default is used.

        See SharedTuplePlatform(IApplicationDescriptor, ITupleStorage, IApplicationTopology, IPhysicalTopologyMonitor, IMessageReceiver) for definitions of default values.

      • SharedTuplePlatform

        public SharedTuplePlatform(IApplicationDescriptor appDesc,
                   ITupleStorage dataStorage)
        Convenience constructor. Create instance with name space and storage, others defaulting.
        Parameters:
        appDesc -
        dataStorage - may be null, in which case default is used.

        See SharedTuplePlatform(IApplicationDescriptor, ITupleStorage, IApplicationTopology, IPhysicalTopologyMonitor, IMessageReceiver) for definitions of default values.

        public SharedTuplePlatform(java.lang.String name,

        Parameters:

        dataStorage -

        See SharedTuplePlatform(IApplicationDescriptor, ITupleStorage, IApplicationTopology, IPhysicalTopologyMonitor, IMessageReceiver) for definitions of default values.

      • SharedTuplePlatform

        public SharedTuplePlatform(java.lang.String namespace)
        Convenience constructor. Create the platform with the given name space, all other configurable instances defaulting.
        Parameters:
        namespace - the name space assigned to this platform.

        See SharedTuplePlatform(IApplicationDescriptor, ITupleStorage, IApplicationTopology, IPhysicalTopologyMonitor, IMessageReceiver) for definitions of default values.
